Package com.csse3200.game.ui

Class SpaceMiniTransition

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.csse3200.game.ui.SpaceMiniTransition
public class SpaceMiniTransition extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
The SpaceMiniTransition class represents a screen transition effect used in a LibGDX game. It allows for transitioning between different game screens with a visual effect. This class extends the LibGDX Actor class and is designed to be used as an actor within a Stage. The transition effect is achieved by moving a transition image diagonally across the screen. When the transition is complete, it can trigger a callback or change to a new game screen.
